body:
Taken from the raw_rnn [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py#L1033) and [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py#L1158).

Perhaps we could write something in the docstring saying "(Default: None) ... will get set to 32 by 'raw_rnn' if set to None"?
